drupalNodeEvent.title: Sci-fi China: Avatars, Aliens, Anthropos 科幻中國：异形，异次元，异托邦

field_speakers.processed: Dingru Huang (Harvard University), Jannis Chen (Harvard University), Dihao Zhou (Yale University), Michael O’Krent (Harvard University), Emily Xueni Jin (Yale University)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_event_website.uri: https://fairbank.fas.harvard.edu/events/sci-fi-china-avatars-aliens-anthropos-科幻中國：异形，异次元，异托邦/

field_description.processed: Please join us for a workshop on Chinese science fiction with writers Han Song, Egoyan Zheng, Regina Kanyu Wang, and Chen Qiufan. Five young scholars will present their latest research. The event is co-hosted by David Der-wei Wang and Mingwei Song.
